name: The Heroic History of Harold Humphries
name_original: The Heroic History of Harold Humphries
description:
Harold - The Hero - Humphries, at your service! You must've heard of me by now. You know, the guy with endless amounts of gold, women, and other treasures. I could even slay a dragon if I wanted. I AM UNSTOPPABLE! Herbert, my man servant, on the other hand is not all that. Just look at those ragged clothes and that dumb expression... I wonder why I keep him around?

Hey... I'm Herbert I see you've met my boss... He's kind of a d*ck, but hey if I'm not there he'll probably get lost or die in some dungeon, so what are ya gonna do...

Instructions:

Move with the arrow keys;

when you move the level advances one turn. The objective of the game is to ensure the hero can get to the finish without getting hurt. 

Gameplay elements include: (moving) enemies and minecarts you can push.

Level editor:

A level editor is available at: https://jossafossa.nl/projects/levelEditor/. You can import your custom level in the level selection screen.

  1. Create level by filling in the width and height inputs on the right and clicking create.
  2. Now you can select sprites on the right and place them on the level on the left by clicking or dragging
  3. A minecart has a rail below it automatically.
  4. Every level needs 1 harold, 1 herbert and 1 goal.
  5. To finalize your custom map, click the create hero path button to enable path drawing mode. Start on the hero and drag a continuous path ending on the goal tile.
  6. Once you are happy with your level copy the text found on the bottom of the sidebar and paste it into the custom level box on the level selection screen.
  7. Enjoy your custom level!
